relevance_rule.rule_text: All abstracts that have client provided keywords

keywords: Dialysis Outcomes and Practice Patterns Study

relevance_rule.reasoning: This rule explicitly states that relevance is determined by the presence of client provided keywords.

priority_rules.rule_text: Phase 2 data, Phase 3 data (including meta-analyses), real-world data (including PROs and registry data), Phosphate binders/phosphate lowering treatment; EXCLUDE Ardelyx sponsored abstracts
priority_rules.reasoning: This rule requires both keyword and contextual understanding (e.g., real-world data, PROs, registry data) and must exclude Ardelyx sponsored abstracts to be mutually exclusive with the Internal priority.
This rule is based on sponsorship and can be identified by keywords.

priority_rules.rule_text: Phase 1 data, retrospective analyses, prognostic studies, trial designs, preclinical studies; studies with trial outcomes and endpoints; other general studies; EXCLUDE Phase 2/3, real-world data, phosphate binder/lowering treatment, Ardelyx sponsored abstracts
priority_rules.reasoning: This rule covers a broad set of study types and outcomes, requiring both keyword and contextual analysis, and must exclude higher priority categories and Ardelyx sponsored abstracts.

priority_rules.rule_text: All abstracts that only have mention of an indication and does not include any other data; EXCLUDE all abstracts with any data (Phase 1/2/3, real-world, preclinical, outcomes, endpoints, Ardelyx sponsored, phosphate binder/lowering treatment)

contextual_concepts: Indication mention without results or study details

priority_rules.reasoning: This rule requires semantic/contextual understanding to identify abstracts that only mention an indication and do not present any data, and must exclude all abstracts with any data or sponsorship.
